.infinite-scroll .container-ArnVJCcM {
  margin: 10px;
}

.container-ArnVJCcM {
  border: 1px solid #461045;
  line-height: normal;
  margin: 0 0 15px;
  position: relative
}

.container-ArnVJCcM .heading {
  background-color: #461045;
  color: #fff;
  font-family: Graphik, sans-serif;
  font-size: 18px;
  font-weight: 700;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 8px;
  text-align: center;
  text-transform: uppercase;
}

.container-ArnVJCcM table {
  width: 100%;
}

.container-ArnVJCcM thead tr {
  background-color: #e4e4e4;
}

.container-ArnVJCcM thead td {
  color: #000;
  font-family: Graphik, sans-serif;
  font-size: 13px;
  font-weight: 700;
  padding: 8px;
}

.container-ArnVJCcM tbody tr:nth-child(even) {
  background-color: #f5f5f5;
}

.container-ArnVJCcM tbody td {
  color: #000;
  font-family: Graphik, sans-serif;
  font-size: 13px;
  padding: 8px;
}

.container-ArnVJCcM .pseudoLink {
  background-color: #5c145a;
  border-radius: 2px;
  color: #fff;
  display: block;
  font-family: Graphik, sans-serif;
  font-size: 13px;
  font-weight: 700;
  margin: 20px;
  padding: 12px;
  text-align: center;
}

.container-ArnVJCcM .pseudoLink::after {
  background-image: url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,);
  content: '';
  display: inline-block;
  height: 16px;
  margin-left: 8px;
  vertical-align: -2.5px;
  width: 9px;
}

.container-ArnVJCcM:hover .pseudoLink {
  background-color: #571b53;
}

.container-ArnVJCcM a {
  bottom: 0;
  left: 0;
  position: absolute;
  right: 0;
  top: 0;
}

.container-ArnVJCcM .visuallyHidden {
  border: 0;
  clip: rect(0 0 0 0);
  height: 1px;
  margin: -1px;
  overflow: hidden;
  padding: 0;
  position: absolute;
  width: 1px;
  white-space: nowrap;
}
